resources.string:
-100 pushups: Build up that upper body strength. Triceps, pectorals, and shoulders all in one. 
-100 Sit-ups: Build up that core strength. Rectus abdominis, transverse abdominis, and obliques, hip flexors, chest, and neck! What value! 
-100 Squats: Build up not only your lower body, but also your core! rectus abdominis, obliques, transverse abdominis, and erector spinae to build up balance, strength, and power. 
-10km run: Build up that core! And everything else, such as gluteals, quadriceps, hamstrings, and calf muscles!
